= Environment Book
:toc:

The Environment book describes the application domain and the environment in which the system will operate.

== E.1 Glossary
Definitions of terms used in the project.

=== E.1.1
*Priority*: Low

*Description*: PEGS stands for Project Environment Goals System.

[#E.1.1]
---


== E.2 Components
Description of the components of the environment.

_No requirements for this chapter._

== E.3 Constraints
Constraints imposed on the system by the environment.

=== E.3.1
*Priority*: High

*Description*: The system must comply with GDPR.

[#E.3.1]
---


== E.4 Assumptions
Assumptions about the environment.

_No requirements for this chapter._

== E.5 Effects
Effects of the system on the environment.

_No requirements for this chapter._

== E.6 Invariants
Properties of the environment that must be preserved.

_No requirements for this chapter._
